text.title: part4_Alex Necochea and Bryn Bennett: the 'Guitar Heroes' of Bang Camaro

hi.s: DS : That 's important for a lot of people - you see your audience .
You 're giving a lot of inspiration to a lot of people .
You do n't know who you might be inspiring to pursue music .

p.s: Oh , kids , do n't be like me ! I would definitely go with nature over man made .

s.hi: DS : What 's your favorite curse word ?

p.s: Fuck .

s.hi: DS : What 's your favorite euphemism for breasts ?

p.s: Big guns .

s.hi: DS : Have you used that recently ?

p.s: Actually , I think I did use that in the last week , and no comment .

s.hi: DS : I read that you named the band after fast women and fast cars .

p.s: Who told you that ?
No , Bang Camaro were two words out of the English language that were the two sexiest words we could think of .
We put them together and they roll off the tongue .
Bang Camaro .
It says a lot more than it means .

s.hi: DS : What sort of qualities do you look for in a woman ?

p.s: I need a girl who is going to make me laugh .
I need a woman who is smarter than I am .
A woman who will always keep me guessing .
Absolutely .
Calling me out for my own jerky bullshit .
I like a girl who is fiercely independent , knows what she wants , and does n't need me .

s.hi:
DS :
Hillary Clinton
or
Barack Obama
?

p.s: Oh , man , I 'm going to get in a lot of trouble for saying Obama .
I would probably go with Obama .
There 's just something in his rhetoric and his oratory that is a lot more inspiring than Hillary .
Hillary , to me , represents not much of a changing of the guard .

s.hi: DS : What would be the greatest of misfortunes to befall you ?

p.s: Oh , if I were to die alone .
No , probably one of my greatest fears is injuring or maiming any of my appendages , to be honest .

s.hi: DS : Do you have any special things you do to make sure you do n't injure or lose an appendage ?

p.s: I do n't keep my hands in my pockets when I am running down stairs .
Yes , that 's a conscious choice .

s.hi: DS : What if you are just walking down stairs ?

p.s: You ca n't realign the stars , man .
Shit will happen , shit will happen .

s.hi: DS : What possession do you treasure most ?

p.s: That 's a good question .
Probably my cat .
I love my cat more than anything .
Sadie .
Yeah , like Sexy Sadie .
That 's exactly what I named her after .
Big John Lennon fan , so I could n't resist .
